SELECT id, name, price FROM PROD_MAIN.TOOL
WHERE name = #{srchStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id, c.MEMBER_ID, c.ID profileid, c.NICKNAME from PROD_MAIN.TOOL a, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE_TOOL b, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE c, PROD_MAIN.PROJECT_ATTENDANT d where a.ID = b.TOOLID and b.PROFILEID = c.ID and c.ID = d.PROFILEID and d.PROJECTID = #{projectid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.STATUS = 'Y' and b.`level` = 5 -- 변경예정 임의로 값 줬음.

select ID, NAME from (select count(*) cnt1 from PROD_MAIN.PROJECT_ATTENDANT where PROJECTID = 1) aa, (select count(*) cnt2 , a.ID , a.NAME from PROD_MAIN.TOOL a, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE_TOOL b, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE c, PROD_MAIN.PROJECT_ATTENDANT d where a.ID = b.TOOLID and b.PROFILEID = c.ID and c.ID = d.PROFILEID and d.PROJECTID = #{projectid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.STATUS = 'Y' and b.`level` is not NULL GROUP BY a.ID) bb where aa.cnt1 = bb.cnt2

select ID, NAME from (select count(*) cnt1 from PROD_MAIN.PROJECT_ATTENDANT where PROJECTID = 1) aa, (select count(*) cnt2 , a.ID , a.NAME from PROD_MAIN.TOOL a, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE_TOOL b, PROD_MAIN.PROFILE c, PROD_MAIN.PROJECT_ATTENDANT d where a.ID = b.TOOLID and b.PROFILEID = c.ID and c.ID = d.PROFILEID and d.PROJECTID = #{projectid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.STATUS = 'Y' and b.`level` > 3 GROUP BY a.ID) bb
where aa.cnt1/2 < bb.cnt2
select * from PROD_MAIN.TOOL where price is null
